name: Felllice 3
description:
Here you have a scanning electron microscope.
Do you see the little sticky cells?

Where will your research take you?

- the bonding abilities of the protozoa are impressive,
- within a very short time, several multicellular cluster have already formed,

- but one cell seems to be special.

This chillware goes into the 3rd round. Even stickier, more relaxed and finally for big screens!

Happy chill!
